title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer - Pivot Broadcast
description:
Available 16:9 Pivot broadcasts. All SD streams are ripped from FilmOn, with the exception of 1x01.

Buffy 1x01 - Welcome to the Hellmouth (HD version available)
Buffy 1x02 - The Harvest

Buffy 1x06 - The Pack
Buffy 1x07 - Angel
Buffy 1x08 - I, Robot... You, Jane
Buffy 1x09 - The Puppet Show
Buffy 1x10 - Nightmares
Buffy 1x11 - Out of Mind, Out of Sight
Buffy 1x12 - Prophecy Girl
Buffy 2x01 - When She Was Bad
Buffy 2x02 - Some Assembly Required


1x08+ are far less cropped with the sides opened up. More episodes (including 1x03-1x05) coming.

See here for details: http://forum.blu-ray.com/showthread.php?t=215038
